Detailed Description

The purpose of this module is to serve files.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

string  basePath,
bool  useLastModifiedHeader,
bool  allowDirectoryListing 
)

Initializes a new instance of the FileModule class.

Parameters:
baseUri Uri to serve, for instance "/files/"
basePath Path on hard drive where we should start looking for files
useLastModifiedHeader If true a Last-Modifed header will be sent upon requests urging webbrowser to cache files
allowDirectoryListing If true a request to a directory will list its content

Property Documentation

string [] HttpServer.HttpModules.AdvancedFileModule.ForbiddenChars [get, set]

characters that may not exist in a path.

fileMod.ForbiddenChars = new string[]{ "\\", "..", ":" };

IDictionary<string, string> HttpServer.HttpModules.AdvancedFileModule.MimeTypes [get]

List with all mime-type that are allowed.

All other mime types will result in a Forbidden http status code.
